content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a message to update the "write_to_file" command with a new filename "league_of_legends_bot_pygame.txt" and new text "We can use the Pygame library to create a GUI for the bot and display game state info." This will allow us to use Pygame to create a graphical user interface for the bot and display game state information. We can still use PyAutoGUI to simulate mouse and keyboard input to control the game, TensorFlow to create a machine learning model to play the game, Selenium WebDriver to automate interactions with the game's web interface, and OpenCV to process and analyze images from the game.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_opencv.txt", "text": "We can use the OpenCV library to analyze the game screen and extract relevant information."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
